verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's scrapping of [ARG1: the Iran deal] [ARG0: he] [V: inherited] raised the stakes for a North Korean agreement he hopes to build , a contradiction over two aspiring nuclear powers that pose the biggest foreign policy challenge yet for his administration .
